<a id="class_Light2D"></a>

# Light2D

**Inherits:** [Node2D](class_node2d.md) **<** [CanvasItem](class_canvasitem.md) **<** [Node](class_node.md) **<** [Object](class_object.md)

**Inherited By:** [DirectionalLight2D](class_directionallight2d.md), [PointLight2D](class_pointlight2d.md)

Casts light in a 2D environment.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

Casts light in a 2D environment. A light is defined as a color, an energy value, a mode (see constants), and various other parameters (range and shadows-related).

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Tutorials

- [2D lights and shadows](../tutorials/2d/2d_lights_and_shadows.md)

<!-- classref-reftable-group -->

<!-- classref-descriptions-group -->

## Enumerations

<a id="enum_Light2D_ShadowFilter"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration -->

enum **ShadowFilter**: [ðŸ”—](#enum_Light2D_ShadowFilter)

<a id="class_Light2D_constant_SHADOW_FILTER_NONE"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[ShadowFilter](class_light2d.md#enum_Light2D_ShadowFilter) **SHADOW_FILTER_NONE** = `0`

No filter applies to the shadow map. This provides hard shadow edges and is the fastest to render. See [shadow_filter](class_light2d.md#class_Light2D_property_shadow_filter).<a id="class_Light2D_constant_SHADOW_FILTER_PCF5"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[ShadowFilter](class_light2d.md#enum_Light2D_ShadowFilter) **SHADOW_FILTER_PCF5** = `1`

Percentage closer filtering (5 samples) applies to the shadow map. This is slower compared to hard shadow rendering. See [shadow_filter](class_light2d.md#class_Light2D_property_shadow_filter).<a id="class_Light2D_constant_SHADOW_FILTER_PCF13"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[ShadowFilter](class_light2d.md#enum_Light2D_ShadowFilter) **SHADOW_FILTER_PCF13** = `2`

Percentage closer filtering (13 samples) applies to the shadow map. This is the slowest shadow filtering mode, and should be used sparingly. See [shadow_filter](class_light2d.md#class_Light2D_property_shadow_filter).<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="enum_Light2D_BlendMode"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration -->

enum **BlendMode**: [ðŸ”—](#enum_Light2D_BlendMode)

<a id="class_Light2D_constant_BLEND_MODE_ADD"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[BlendMode](class_light2d.md#enum_Light2D_BlendMode) **BLEND_MODE_ADD** = `0`

Adds the value of pixels corresponding to the Light2D to the values of pixels under it. This is the common behavior of a light.<a id="class_Light2D_constant_BLEND_MODE_SUB"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[BlendMode](class_light2d.md#enum_Light2D_BlendMode) **BLEND_MODE_SUB** = `1`

Subtracts the value of pixels corresponding to the Light2D to the values of pixels under it, resulting in inversed light effect.<a id="class_Light2D_constant_BLEND_MODE_MIX"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[BlendMode](class_light2d.md#enum_Light2D_BlendMode) **BLEND_MODE_MIX** = `2`

Mix the value of pixels corresponding to the Light2D to the values of pixels under it by linear interpolation.<hr class="classref-section-separator">

<!-- classref-descriptions-group -->

## Property Descriptions

<a id="class_Light2D_property_blend_mode"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[BlendMode](class_light2d.md#enum_Light2D_BlendMode) **blend_mode** = `0` [ðŸ”—](#class_Light2D_property_blend_mode)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- [bool](class_bool.md) **is_editor_only**\ (\ )

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_enabled**\ (\ value\: [bool](class_bool.md)\ )
- [bool](class_bool.md) **is_enabled**\ (\ )

If ``true``, Light2D will emit light.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_Light2D_property_energy"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[float](class_float.md) **energy** = `1.0` [ðŸ”—](#class_Light2D_property_energy)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_energy**\ (\ value\: [float](class_float.md)\ )
- [float](class_float.md) **get_energy**\ (\ )

The Light2D's energy value. The larger the value, the stronger the light.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_Light2D_property_range_item_cull_mask"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[int](class_int.md) **range_item_cull_mask** = `1` [ðŸ”—](#class_Light2D_property_range_item_cull_mask)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_item_cull_mask**\ (\ value\: [int](class_int.md)\ )
- [int](class_int.md) **get_item_cull_mask**\ (\ )

The layer mask. Only objects with a matching [CanvasItem.light_mask](class_canvasitem.md#class_CanvasItem_property_light_mask) will be affected by the Light2D. See also [shadow_item_cull_mask](class_light2d.md#class_Light2D_property_shadow_item_cull_mask), which affects which objects can cast shadows.

\ **Note:** [range_item_cull_mask](class_light2d.md#class_Light2D_property_range_item_cull_mask) is ignored by [DirectionalLight2D](class_directionallight2d.md), which will always light a 2D node regardless of the 2D node's [CanvasItem.light_mask](class_canvasitem.md#class_CanvasItem_property_light_mask).

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_Light2D_property_range_layer_max"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[int](class_int.md) **range_layer_max** = `0` [ðŸ”—](#class_Light2D_property_range_layer_max)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_layer_range_max**\ (\ value\: [int](class_int.md)\ )
- [int](class_int.md) **get_layer_range_max**\ (\ )

Maximum layer value of objects that are affected by the Light2D.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_Light2D_property_range_layer_min"></a>

- `void` **set_layer_range_min**\ (\ value\: [int](class_int.md)\ )
- [int](class_int.md) **get_layer_range_min**\ (\ )

Minimum layer value of objects that are affected by the Light2D.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_Light2D_property_range_z_max"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[int](class_int.md) **range_z_max** = `1024` [ðŸ”—](#class_Light2D_property_range_z_max)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_z_range_max**\ (\ value\: [int](class_int.md)\ )
- [int](class_int.md) **get_z_range_max**\ (\ )

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<!-- classref-property -->

[int](class_int.md) **range_z_min** = `-1024` [ðŸ”—](#class_Light2D_property_range_z_min)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_z_range_min**\ (\ value\: [int](class_int.md)\ )
- [int](class_int.md) **get_z_range_min**\ (\ )

Minimum ``z`` value of objects that are affected by the Light2D.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_Light2D_property_shadow_color"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[Color](class_color.md) **shadow_color** = `Color(0, 0, 0, 0)` [ðŸ”—](#class_Light2D_property_shadow_color)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_shadow_color**\ (\ value\: [Color](class_color.md)\ )
- [Color](class_color.md) **get_shadow_color**\ (\ )

[Color](class_color.md) of shadows cast by the Light2D.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_Light2D_property_shadow_enabled"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[bool](class_bool.md) **shadow_enabled** = `false` [ðŸ”—](#class_Light2D_property_shadow_enabled)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_shadow_enabled**\ (\ value\: [bool](class_bool.md)\ )
- [bool](class_bool.md) **is_shadow_enabled**\ (\ )

If ``true``, the Light2D will cast shadows.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_Light2D_property_shadow_filter"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[ShadowFilter](class_light2d.md#enum_Light2D_ShadowFilter) **shadow_filter** = `0` [ðŸ”—](#class_Light2D_property_shadow_filter)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_shadow_filter**\ (\ value\: [ShadowFilter](class_light2d.md#enum_Light2D_ShadowFilter)\ )
- [ShadowFilter](class_light2d.md#enum_Light2D_ShadowFilter) **get_shadow_filter**\ (\ )

Shadow filter type.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_Light2D_property_shadow_filter_smooth"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[float](class_float.md) **shadow_filter_smooth** = `0.0` [ðŸ”—](#class_Light2D_property_shadow_filter_smooth)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_shadow_smooth**\ (\ value\: [float](class_float.md)\ )
- [float](class_float.md) **get_shadow_smooth**\ (\ )

Smoothing value for shadows. Higher values will result in softer shadows, at the cost of visible streaks that can appear in shadow rendering. [shadow_filter_smooth](class_light2d.md#class_Light2D_property_shadow_filter_smooth) only has an effect if [shadow_filter](class_light2d.md#class_Light2D_property_shadow_filter) is [SHADOW_FILTER_PCF5](class_light2d.md#class_Light2D_constant_SHADOW_FILTER_PCF5) or [SHADOW_FILTER_PCF13](class_light2d.md#class_Light2D_constant_SHADOW_FILTER_PCF13).

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_Light2D_property_shadow_item_cull_mask"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[int](class_int.md) **shadow_item_cull_mask** = `1` [ðŸ”—](#class_Light2D_property_shadow_item_cull_mask)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_item_shadow_cull_mask**\ (\ value\: [int](class_int.md)\ )
- [int](class_int.md) **get_item_shadow_cull_mask**\ (\ )

The shadow mask. Used with [LightOccluder2D](class_lightoccluder2d.md) to cast shadows. Only occluders with a matching [CanvasItem.light_mask](class_canvasitem.md#class_CanvasItem_property_light_mask) will cast shadows. See also [range_item_cull_mask](class_light2d.md#class_Light2D_property_range_item_cull_mask), which affects which objects can *receive* the light.

<hr class="classref-section-separator">

<!-- classref-descriptions-group -->

## Method Descriptions

<a id="class_Light2D_method_get_height"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

[float](class_float.md) **get_height**\ (\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#class_Light2D_method_get_height)

Returns the light's height, which is used in 2D normal mapping. See [PointLight2D.height](class_pointlight2d.md#class_PointLight2D_property_height) and [DirectionalLight2D.height](class_directionallight2d.md#class_DirectionalLight2D_property_height).

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_Light2D_method_set_height"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **set_height**\ (\ height\: [float](class_float.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#class_Light2D_method_set_height)

Sets the light's height, which is used in 2D normal mapping. See [PointLight2D.height](class_pointlight2d.md#class_PointLight2D_property_height) and [DirectionalLight2D.height](class_directionallight2d.md#class_DirectionalLight2D_property_height).
